thread.section_title: BURG TRANSLATIONS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BURG TRANSLATIONS | burgtranslations.com
thread.title: Perry

author: Perry
title: Perry
text: BURG Translations is a very professional service that has been quick and reliable with each translation sent. My experience has been excellent and every deadline has been made. Brad Bina has been my direct contact with the company. Brad is very hands on with each translation, and makes sure that the quality and satisfaction always meets my expectations. I would recommend BURG Translations to anyone in need of translation services.
